page.title: 12LOCAL NEWS SUMMER 1985
page.content: ESTATE WALK THE SOUTH EAST REGION OF THE {SCOTTISH {LANDOWNERS}UNION,IN CONJUNCTION WITH TIMBER GROWERS{(U.K.)}ORGANISED AN EXCURSION TO{RIDDELL ESTATE} LILLIESLEAF. THE EXCURSION WAS HELD BY THE KIND PERMISSION OF MAJ.J.SPROT AND MR.A.S GRANT. THE VISIT TOOK THE FORM OF TWO ESTATE WALKS THROUGH WOODLAND AND FARMLAND. RAFT RACE. ON SUNDAY 25TH MAY,THERE WAS{" THE {GREAT TWEED RAFT RACE."}SOME PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE ENTERED A RAFT CALLED, {"KELLIES HEROES".}THIS WAS A RAFT DONE UP TO LOOK LIKE A TANK.IT WON FIRST PRIZE IN THE FANCY DRESS SECTION.IT ALSO COMPLETED THE COURSE FROM{KELSO} TO {CARHAM}WITHOUT SINKING.
